ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cold cream cheese, cubed
des: "If you want easy and caviar, this is it. Just cream cheese with caviar. You may want to double the amounts depending on how many people are involved. Use your favorite caviar and favorite crackers or miniature toast. I like to use garlic toast."
ins: Spread cream cheese on a serving dish. Top with caviar. Chill until serving.
